og.description: Healthcare fixes, central-bank smackdowns and the economics of Lebron James: Editor-in-Chief Steve Forbes selects (in no particular order) his eight favorite books of the year--several penned by current or former Forbes contributors.
og.title: Turning The Page On 2015
